import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Shop_2 from "./shop_2" import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Shop_1() { const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState("price_down"); const navigate = useNavigate(); var onSearch = (event) => { var keyword = event.target.keyword.value navigate(`/search/${keyword}`,{replace: true}); } const handleSortChange = (e) => { setSortOrder(e.target.value) } const sortByPrice = (products) => { if (sortOrder === 'price_up') { return products.sort() } } return ( <>
